content.prompt: In the fifth paragraph, the author mentions that she “got up at two or three in the morning and wrote” primarily to

choices.label: demonstrate the intensity of her devotion to writing
emphasize that punctuality is necessary for writers
break her silence about a painful period in her life
show how financial insecurity can limit a writer’s career

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
